resources.string:
"SUMMARY
" "IT professional with an Electrical/Computer Engineering background for the last 20 years " "with the focus on Android software development the past 10 years. Experienced in the " "automotive and cellular industry as a Software Engineer using Android development platform. " "I have experience in creating applications, compiling and building source code for both " "infotainment and mobile phones, building boot loaders and kernels on a device level. " "Currently, I am working as a mobile software developer for an auto-insurance company where " "we collect sensor data via android app with user consent for analytical and rating " "purposes. I am self-motivated, eager to learn about new technologies and I strive for " "continued excellence.

"
EDUCATION EXPERIENCE
 MSEE (Master of Science in Electrical Engineering), Florida Atlantic University, Boca Raton, FL, 12/2002 Dissertation Title: DSP Implementation of a MAP (Maximum A Posteriori Probability) Turbo Decoder on TI TMS320C30 Floating Point Processor using Matlab, Assembly (Lower level language), and C (Higher Level Language)
 BSEE (Bachelor of Sceince in Electrical Engineering), Florida Atlantic University, Boca Raton, FL, 04/1997

"
**For more information please visit this app later, thanks! )**
